items.sentence: I'll mow the lawn tomorrow if it's not raining.
We'll fight to the end to protect our homeland.
We'll dine together and then go to the theater.
I'll be with you as soon as I finish my dinner.
I can't believe Tom and Mary are still married.
I thought Tom and Mary handled themselves well.
Tom gets along well with all of his classmates.
Tom got hit by a car and was seriously injured.
Tom is convinced Mary won't be able to do that.
We're not yet convinced that we should do that.
